response.overview: Karen, a single mother, gifts her son Andy a Buddi doll for his birthday, unaware of its more sinister nature. A contemporary re-imagining of the 1988 horror classic.
response.tagline: More than a toy... he's your best friend.
response.title: Child's Play

titles.title: Child's Play: La poupée du mal

results.name: “You Are My Buddy Until the End!”
Behind the Scenes: "Bringing Chucky to Life"
